title: Prisoner Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, February 18, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a deep dive into the bold, rule-breaking wines of The Prisoner Wine Company, celebrated for rich blends, plush textures, and unforgettable flavor.

Tasting Fee: $30 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• The Prisoner Red Blend 2022 – Lush and smooth with ripe raspberry, blackberry, pomegranate, coconut, and warm vanilla.

• The Prisoner Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – Powerful yet polished with dried currant, baking spice, espresso, cocoa, and structured tannins.

• Unshackled Cabernet Sauvignon – Fruit-driven and vibrant with plum, blackberry, clove, dried herbs, and balanced acidity.

• Unshackled Red Blend – Juicy and expressive with raspberry, blueberry, crushed violets, spiced cherry, and a lift of white pepper.

Discover your new favorite from one of California’s most iconic modern wine portfolios.
